objects.name: File, credentials or data exfiltrationÂ
objects.description: Upload file, credentials or data exfiltration with Binary part of Windows Defender
objects.pattern: [process:command_line MATCHES '^.*process\.command_line : \(\*ConfigSecurityPolicy\.exe\) or process\.executable: \(\*ConfigSecurityPolicy\.exe\) or file\.name: \(\*ConfigSecurityPolicy\.exe\) and process\.command_line : \("\*https://\*" or "\*http://\*" or "\*ftp://\*"\).*$']
